name: Firewater
description:
'''Firewater''' is an American band founded by American singer/instrumentalist [[Tod A.]] in New York City in 1995, after the breakup of his previous group [[Cop Shoot Cop]]. A self-described "world punk" band, Firewater incorporate diverse elements of [[world music]] with [[punk rock]] rhythms, including [[cabaret]], [[ska]], [[jazz]], [[folk music|folk]] and most notably Eastern European influences such as [[klezmer]] and [[romani (people)|gypsy]] music, which has led to their inclusion in the [[gypsy punk]] genre.

{{As of|2012|alt=By 2012}}, Firewater had released seven studio albums and seen some success, particularly in Europe and on United States [[college radio]] stations.
